product_name: ProRack Hitch Carrier 2 Bike Hitch Rack
long_description: The ProRack Hitch Carrier 2 Bike hitch rack is affordable, convenient and easy-to-load. Dual-arm design carries bikes securely and tilting mast allows for simple access to your rear cargo area. Rubber cradles and rip-and-stick straps offer quick and easy bike attachment; short straps secure wheels to frame; long straps secure frame to rack. Mast tilts forward offering easy access to your rear hatch or tailgate-simply remove the pin and tilt forward. Threaded hitch pin helps reduce rack vibration, noise and wobble for quiet transport; hitch adapter sleeve lets you use in a 1.25 or 2 in. hitch. Sturdy steel construction features a silver powder coat finish. Carrying capacity: 2 bikes. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: The ProRack Hitch Carrier 2 Bike hitch rack is affordable, convenient and easy-to-load. Dual-arm design carries bikes securely and tilting mast allows for simple access to your rear cargo area.
